text: Alniphyllum is a genus of three species of flowering plants in the family Styracaceae, native to eastern Asia, from central China south to India and Vietnam.Flora of China: Alniphyllum The species are small to medium-sized deciduous trees growing to 15–30 m tall. ;Species * Alniphyllum eberhardtii Guillaum. * Alniphyllum fortunei (Hemsl.) Makino * Alniphyllum pterospermum Matsum. ==References== Category:Styracaceae Category:Ericales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Alniphyllum
